column10: Unsignaled crosswalk- drivers do not stop for pedestrians - very dangerous for people crossing street into mason district park or for people crossing from the park to other side of Columbia pike because there is no sidewalk continuation on the park side
column21: Sidewalk ends on both sides of Columbia pike between mason district park and sleepy hollow road so impossible to walk safely on this stretch of road
